# `chevron`: Standard TLGs for clinical trials reporting

[![Check
ðŸ› ](https://github.com/insightsengineering/chevron/actions/workflows/check.yaml/badge.svg)](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/main/unit-test-report/)
[![Docs
ðŸ“š](https://github.com/insightsengineering/chevron/actions/workflows/docs.yaml/badge.svg)](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/)
[![Code Coverage
ðŸ“”](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/insightsengineering/chevron/_xml_coverage_reports/data/main/badge.svg)](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/main/coverage-report/)

![GitHub
forks](https://img.shields.io/github/forks/insightsengineering/chevron?style=social)![GitHub
repo
stars](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/insightsengineering/chevron?style=social)

![GitHub commit
activity](https://img.shields.io/github/commit-activity/m/insightsengineering/chevron)![GitHub
contributors](https://img.shields.io/github/contributors/insightsengineering/chevron)![GitHub
last
commit](https://img.shields.io/github/last-commit/insightsengineering/chevron)![GitHub
pull
requests](https://img.shields.io/github/issues-pr/insightsengineering/chevron)![GitHub
repo
size](https://img.shields.io/github/repo-size/insightsengineering/chevron)![GitHub
language
count](https://img.shields.io/github/languages/count/insightsengineering/chevron)[![Project
Status: Active â€“ The project has reached a stable, usable state and is
being actively
developed.](https://www.repostatus.org/badges/latest/active.svg)](https://www.repostatus.org/#active)
[![Current
Version](https://img.shields.io/github/r-package/v/insightsengineering/chevron/main?color=purple&label=package%20version)](https://github.com/insightsengineering/chevron/tree/main)
[![Open
Issues](https://img.shields.io/github/issues-raw/insightsengineering/chevron?color=red&label=open%20issues)](https://github.com/insightsengineering/chevron/issues?q=is%3Aissue+is%3Aopen+sort%3Aupdated-desc)

`chevron` is a collection of high-level functions to create standard
outputs for clinical trials reporting with limited parameterisation.
These outputs includes:

- [Tables](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/latest-tag/articles/chevron_catalog.html#tables):
  - safety table, e.g.
    - [Safety Summary
      (`AET01`)](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/latest-tag/articles/chevron_catalog.html#safety-summary-aet01)
  - adverse events table, e.g.
    - [Adverse Events
      (`AET02`)](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/latest-tag/articles/chevron_catalog.html#adverse-events-aet02)
    - [Adverse Events by Greatest Intensity
      (`AET03`)](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/latest-tag/articles/chevron_catalog.html#adverse-events-by-greatest-intensityaet03)
    - [Most Common (\>=5%) Adverse Events
      (`AET10`)](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/latest-tag/articles/chevron_catalog.html#most-common-5-adverse-events-aet10)
  - demographic table, e.g.
    - [Demographics and Baseline Characteristics
      (`DMT01`)](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/latest-tag/articles/chevron_catalog.html#demographics-and-baseline-characteristics-dmt01)
  - ECG table, e.g.
    - [ECG Results and Change from Baseline by Visit
      (`EGT01`)](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/latest-tag/articles/chevron_catalog.html#ecg-results-and-change-from-baseline-by-visit-egt01)
    - [ECG Abnormalities (Regardless of Abnormality at Baseline)
      (`EGT02_1`)](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/latest-tag/articles/chevron_catalog.html#ecg-abnormalities-regardless-of-abnormality-at-baseline-egt02_1)
    - [ECG Abnormalities (Among Subject Without Abnormality at Baseline)
      (`EGT02_2`)](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/latest-tag/articles/chevron_catalog.html#ecg-abnormalities-among-subject-without-abnormality-at-baseline-egt02_2)
  - lab results table, e.g.
    - [Laboratory Test Results and Change from Baseline by Visit
      (`LBT01`)](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/latest-tag/articles/chevron_catalog.html#laboratory-test-results-and-change-from-baseline-by-visit-lbt01)
    - [Laboratory Abnormalities
      (`LBT04`)](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/latest-tag/articles/chevron_catalog.html#laboratory-abnormalities-lbt04)
    - [Laboratory Abnormalities with Single and Replicated Marked
      (`LBT05`)](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/latest-tag/articles/chevron_catalog.html#laboratory-abnormalities-with-single-and-replicated-marked-lbt05)
  - medical history table, e.g.
    - [Medical History
      (`MHT01`)](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/latest-tag/articles/chevron_catalog.html#medical-history-mht01)
  - response table, e.g.
    - [Best Overall Response
      (`RSPT01`)](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/latest-tag/articles/chevron_catalog.html#best-overall-response-rspt01)
  - time to event table, e.g.
    - [Time-to-event Summary
      (`TTET01`)](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/latest-tag/articles/chevron_catalog.html#time-to-event-summary-ttet01)
  - vital signs, e.g.
    - [Vital Signs
      (`VST01`)](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/latest-tag/articles/chevron_catalog.html#vital-signs-vst01)
    - [Vital Signs Abnormalities (Regardless of Abnormality at Baseline)
      (`VST02_1`)](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/latest-tag/articles/chevron_catalog.html#vital-signs-abnormalities-regardless-of-abnormality-at-baseline-vst02_1)
    - [Vital Signs Abnormalities (Among Subject Without Abnormality at
      Baseline)
      (`VST02_2`)](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/latest-tag/articles/chevron_catalog.html#vital-signs-abnormalities-among-subject-without-abnormality-at-baseline-vst02_2)
- [Listings](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/latest-tag/articles/chevron_catalog.html#listings)
- [Graphs](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/latest-tag/articles/chevron_catalog.html#graphics):
  - [Kaplan-Meier Plot
    (`KMG01`)](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/latest-tag/articles/chevron_catalog.html#kaplan-meier-plot-kmg01)
  - [Mean Plot
    (`MNG01`)](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/latest-tag/articles/chevron_catalog.html#mean-plot-mng01)

Please visit [the
catalog](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/latest-tag/articles/chevron_catalog.html)
to see full list of available outputs. If you want a new output, please
[create an
issue](https://github.com/insightsengineering/chevron/issues/new?template=new_table.yml).

If you need more flexibility please refer to
[`tern`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/tern/) with its [TLG
Catalog](https://insightsengineering.github.io/tlg-catalog/).

## Installation

`chevron` is available on CRAN and you can install the latest released
version with:

``` r

install.packages("chevron")
```

Alternatively, you might also use the development version.

``` r

# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("insightsengineering/chevron")
```

## Usage

To understand how to use this package, please refer to the [Introduction
to
`chevron`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/latest-tag/articles/chevron.html)
article, which provides multiple examples of code implementation.

Below is the showcase of the example usage.

``` r

library(chevron)

data(syn_data)
run(aet02, syn_data)
```

which returns

``` text
  MedDRA System Organ Class                                     A: Drug X    B: Placebo    C: Combination
    MedDRA Preferred Term                                        (N=134)       (N=134)        (N=132)
  â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”
  Total number of patients with at least one adverse event     122 (91.0%)   123 (91.8%)    120 (90.9%)
  Overall total number of events                                   609           622            703
  cl A.1
    Total number of patients with at least one adverse event   78 (58.2%)    75 (56.0%)      89 (67.4%)
    Total number of events                                         132           130            160
    dcd A.1.1.1.1                                              50 (37.3%)    45 (33.6%)      63 (47.7%)
    dcd A.1.1.1.2                                              48 (35.8%)    48 (35.8%)      50 (37.9%)
  cl B.2
    Total number of patients with at least one adverse event   79 (59.0%)    74 (55.2%)      85 (64.4%)
    Total number of events                                         129           138            143
    dcd B.2.2.3.1                                              48 (35.8%)    54 (40.3%)      51 (38.6%)
    dcd B.2.1.2.1                                              49 (36.6%)    44 (32.8%)      52 (39.4%)
  cl D.1
    Total number of patients with at least one adverse event   79 (59.0%)    67 (50.0%)      80 (60.6%)
    Total number of events                                         127           106            135
    dcd D.1.1.1.1                                              50 (37.3%)    42 (31.3%)      51 (38.6%)
    dcd D.1.1.4.2                                              48 (35.8%)    42 (31.3%)      50 (37.9%)
  cl D.2
    Total number of patients with at least one adverse event   47 (35.1%)    58 (43.3%)      57 (43.2%)
    Total number of events                                         62            72              74
    dcd D.2.1.5.3                                              47 (35.1%)    58 (43.3%)      57 (43.2%)
  cl B.1
    Total number of patients with at least one adverse event   47 (35.1%)    49 (36.6%)      43 (32.6%)
    Total number of events                                         56            60              62
    dcd B.1.1.1.1                                              47 (35.1%)    49 (36.6%)      43 (32.6%)
  cl C.2
    Total number of patients with at least one adverse event   35 (26.1%)    48 (35.8%)      55 (41.7%)
    Total number of events                                         48            53              65
    dcd C.2.1.2.1                                              35 (26.1%)    48 (35.8%)      55 (41.7%)
  cl C.1
    Total number of patients with at least one adverse event   43 (32.1%)    46 (34.3%)      43 (32.6%)
    Total number of events                                         55            63              64
    dcd C.1.1.1.3                                              43 (32.1%)    46 (34.3%)      43 (32.6%)
```

## Related

- [`rtables`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/rtables/) - table
  engine used
- [`tern`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/tern/) - analysis
  function used

## Acknowledgment

This package is a result of a joint efforts by many developers and
stakeholders. We would like to thank everyone who has contributed so
far!

# Package index

## Package Overview

- [`chevron`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/chevron-package.md)
  [`chevron-package`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/chevron-package.md)
  :

  `chevron` package

## Classes and Instances

- [`chevron_t()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/chevron_tlg-class.md)
  [`chevron_l()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/chevron_tlg-class.md)
  [`chevron_g()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/chevron_tlg-class.md)
  [`chevron_simple()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/chevron_tlg-class.md)
  :

  `chevron_tlg` class

## Methods

- [`args_ls()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/args_ls.md)
  : Get Arguments List

- [`run()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/run.md)
  : Run the TLG-generating pipeline

- [`main()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/main.md)
  [`` `main<-`() ``](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/main.md)
  : Main

- [`preprocess()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/preprocess.md)
  [`` `preprocess<-`() ``](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/preprocess.md)
  : Pre process

- [`postprocess()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/postprocess.md)
  [`` `postprocess<-`() ``](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/postprocess.md)
  : Post process

- [`dataset()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/dataset.md)
  [`` `dataset<-`() ``](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/dataset.md)
  : Data Set

- [`script_funs()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/script.md)
  :

  Create Script for `TLG` Generation

## chevron_tlg objects

- [`ael01_nollt_main()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/ael01_nollt.md)
  [`ael01_nollt_pre()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/ael01_nollt.md)
  [`ael01_nollt`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/ael01_nollt.md)
  :

  `AEL01_NOLLT` Listing 1 (Default) Glossary of Preferred Terms and
  Investigator-Specified Terms.

- [`ael02_main()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/ael02.md)
  [`ael02_pre()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/ael02.md)
  [`ael02`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/ael02.md)
  :

  `AEL02` Listing 1 (Default) Listing of Adverse Events.

- [`ael03_main()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/ael03.md)
  [`ael03_pre()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/ael03.md)
  [`ael03`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/ael03.md)
  :

  `AEL03` Listing 1 (Default) Listing of Serious Adverse Events.

- [`aet01_main()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/aet01.md)
  [`aet01_pre()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/aet01.md)
  [`aet01_post()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/aet01.md)
  [`aet01`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/aet01.md)
  :

  `AET01` Table 1 (Default) Overview of Deaths and Adverse Events
  Summary Table 1.

- [`aet01_aesi_main()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/aet01_aesi.md)
  [`aet01_aesi_pre()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/aet01_aesi.md)
  [`aet01_aesi_post()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/aet01_aesi.md)
  [`aet01_aesi`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/aet01_aesi.md)
  :

  `AET01_AESI` Table 1 (Default) Adverse Event of Special Interest
  Summary Table.

- [`aet02_label`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/aet02.md)
  [`aet02_main()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/aet02.md)
  [`aet02_pre()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/aet02.md)
  [`aet02_post()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/aet02.md)
  [`aet02`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/aet02.md)
  :

  `AET02` Table 1 (Default) Adverse Events by System Organ Class and
  Preferred Term Table 1.

- [`aet03_main()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/aet03.md)
  [`aet03_pre()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/aet03.md)
  [`aet03_post()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/aet03.md)
  [`aet03`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/aet03.md)
  :

  `AET03` Table 1 (Default) Advert Events by Greatest Intensity Table 1.

- [`aet04_main()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/aet04.md)
  [`aet04_pre()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/aet04.md)
  [`aet04_post()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/aet04.md)
  [`aet04`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/aet04.md)
  :

  `AET04` Table 1 (Default) Adverse Events by Highest `NCI` `CTACAE`
  `AE` Grade Table 1.

- [`aet05_main()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/aet05.md)
  [`aet05_pre()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/aet05.md)
  [`aet05_post()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/aet05.md)
  [`aet05`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/aet05.md)
  :

  `AET05` Table 1 (Default) Adverse Event Rate Adjusted for
  Patient-Years at Risk - First Occurrence.

- [`aet05_all_pre()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/aet05_all.md)
  [`aet05_all`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/aet05_all.md)
  :

  `AET05_ALL` Table 1 (Default) Adverse Event Rate Adjusted for
  Patient-Years at Risk - All Occurrences.

- [`aet10_main()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/aet10.md)
  [`aet10_pre()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/aet10.md)
  [`aet10_post()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/aet10.md)
  [`aet10`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/aet10.md)
  :

  `AET10` Table 1 (Default) Most Common (xx%) Adverse Events Preferred
  Terms Table 1.

- [`cfbt01_main()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/cfbt01.md)
  [`cfbt01_pre()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/cfbt01.md)
  [`cfbt01_post()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/cfbt01.md)
  [`cfbt01`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/cfbt01.md)
  :

  `CFBT01` Change from Baseline By Visit Table.

- [`cml02a_gl_main()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/cml02a_gl.md)
  [`cml02a_gl_pre()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/cml02a_gl.md)
  [`cml02a_gl`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/cml02a_gl.md)
  :

  `CML02A_GL` Listing 1 (Default) Concomitant Medication Class Level 2,
  Preferred Name, and Investigator-Specified Terms.

- [`cmt01_label`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/cmt01a.md)
  [`cmt01a_main()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/cmt01a.md)
  [`cmt01a_pre()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/cmt01a.md)
  [`cmt01a_post()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/cmt01a.md)
  [`cmt01a`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/cmt01a.md)
  :

  `CMT01A` Concomitant Medication by Medication Class and Preferred
  Name.

- [`cmt02_pt_main()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/cmt02_pt.md)
  [`cmt02_pt_pre()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/cmt02_pt.md)
  [`cmt02_pt_post()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/cmt02_pt.md)
  [`cmt02_pt`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/cmt02_pt.md)
  :

  `CMT02_PT` Table 1 (Default) Concomitant Medications by Preferred
  Name.

- [`coxt01_main()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/coxt01.md)
  [`coxt01_pre()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/coxt01.md)
  [`coxt01_post()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/coxt01.md)
  [`coxt01`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/coxt01.md)
  :

  `COXT01` (Default) Cox Regression Model Table.

- [`coxt02_main()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/coxt02.md)
  [`coxt02`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/coxt02.md)
  :

  `COXT02` Multi-Variable Cox Regression Model Table.

- [`dmt01_main()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/dmt01.md)
  [`dmt01_pre()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/dmt01.md)
  [`dmt01_post()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/dmt01.md)
  [`dmt01`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/dmt01.md)
  :

  `DMT01` Table 1 (Default) Demographics and Baseline Characteristics
  Table 1.

- [`dst01_main()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/dst01.md)
  [`dst01_pre()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/dst01.md)
  [`dst01_post()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/dst01.md)
  [`dst01`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/dst01.md)
  : DST01 Table 1 (Default) Patient Disposition Table 1.

- [`dtht01_main()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/dtht01.md)
  [`dtht01_pre()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/dtht01.md)
  [`dtht01_post()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/dtht01.md)
  [`dtht01`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/dtht01.md)
  :

  `DTHT01` Table 1 (Default) Death Table.

- [`egt01_main()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/egt01.md)
  [`egt01_pre()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/egt01.md)
  [`egt01`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/egt01.md)
  :

  `EGT01` ECG Parameters and Change from Baseline By Visit Table.

- [`egt02_1_main()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/egt02_1.md)
  [`egt02_pre()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/egt02_1.md)
  [`egt02_post()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/egt02_1.md)
  [`egt02_1`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/egt02_1.md)
  :

  `EGT02` ECG Abnormalities Table.

- [`egt02_2_main()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/egt02_2.md)
  [`egt02_2`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/egt02_2.md)
  :

  `EGT02_2` ECG Abnormalities Table.

- [`egt03_main()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/egt03.md)
  [`egt03_pre()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/egt03.md)
  [`egt03_post()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/egt03.md)
  [`egt03`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/egt03.md)
  :

  `EGT03` Shift Table of ECG Interval Data - Baseline versus Minimum or
  Maximum Post-Baseline.

- [`egt05_qtcat_main()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/egt05_qtcat.md)
  [`egt05_qtcat_pre()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/egt05_qtcat.md)
  [`egt05_qtcat_post()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/egt05_qtcat.md)
  [`egt05_qtcat`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/egt05_qtcat.md)
  :

  `EGT05_QTCAT` ECG Actual Values and Changes from Baseline by Visit
  Table.

  `EXT01` Exposure Summary Table.

  :

  Example `adam` Synthetic Data

  [`lbt01_pre()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/lbt01.md)
  [`lbt01`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/lbt01.md)

  :

  `LBT01` Lab Results and Change from Baseline by Visit Table.

  [`lbt05_pre()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/lbt05.md)
  [`lbt05_post()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/lbt05.md)

  Replicated Marked.

  : CTC version 5 Grade Direction Data

  : MLA Grade Direction Data

## Utility Functions

- [`assert_single_value()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/assert_single_value.md)
  : Check variable only has one unique value.

- [`assert_valid_type()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/assert_valid_type.md)
  : Check variable is of correct type

- [`assert_valid_var()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/assert_valid_var.md)
  : Check whether var is valid

- [`assert_valid_var_pair()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/assert_valid_var_pair.md)
  : Check variables are of same levels

- [`assert_valid_variable()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/assert_valid_variable.md)
  : Check variables in a data frame are valid character or factor.

- [`create_id_listings()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/create_id_listings.md)
  : Concatenate Site and Subject ID

- [`report_null()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/report_null.md)
  [`standard_null_report()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/report_null.md)
  :

  Creates `NULL` Report

- [`std_postprocessing()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/std_postprocessing.md)
  : Standard Post Processing

- [`smart_prune()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/smart_prune.md)
  :

  Prune table up to an `ElementaryTable`

- [`var_labels_for()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/var_labels_for.md)
  : Retrieve labels for certain variables

- [`format_date()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/format_date.md)
  : Formatting of date

- [`gg_theme_chevron()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/gg_theme_chevron.md)
  : Theme for Chevron Plot

- [`h_format_dec()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/h_format_dec.md)
  : Decimal formatting

- [`listing_format_chevron()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/listing_format_chevron.md)
  : Format for Chevron Listings

- [`lvls()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/lvls.md)
  : Obtain levels from vector

- [`convert_to_month()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/convert_to_month.md)
  : Helper function to convert to months if needed

- [`get_section_div()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/get_section_div.md)
  : Get Section dividers

- [`set_section_div()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/set_section_div.md)
  : Set Section Dividers

## Standard Reformatting Rules

- [`nocoding`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/nocoding.md)
  : No Coding Available rule
- [`missing_rule`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/missing_rule.md)
  : Missing rule
- [`empty_rule`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/empty_rule.md)
  : Empty rule
- [`get_grade_rule()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/get_grade_rule.md)
  : Get grade rule
- [`dose_change_rule`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/dose_change_rule.md)
  : Dose Change Rule
- [`outcome_rule`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/outcome_rule.md)
  : Outcome Rule
- [`yes_no_rule`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/yes_no_rule.md)
  : Yes/No rule in title case

## Non-exported Documented Functions for Packagage Developers

- [`gen_args()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/gen_args.md)
  : General Argument Name Convention
- [`fuse_sequentially()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/fuse_sequentially.md)
  : Fuse list elements

## Deprecated Functions

- [`grob_list()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/grob_list.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** :

  List of `grob` object

- [`gg_list()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/chevron/reference/gg_list.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** :

  List of `gg` object
